fullplot: A grieving mother, Telly Paretta, is struggling to cope with the loss of her 9-year-old son. She is stunned when her psychiatrist and her husband tell her that she has created eight years of memories of a son she never had. But when she meets the father of one of her son's friend who is having the same experience, Telly embarks on a mission to prove her son's existence and her sanity.
plot: After being told that their children never existed, a man and woman soon discover there is a much bigger enemy at work.
title: The Forgotten

tomatoes.consensus: The premise grows too ridiculous to take seriously.
